channel.title: Blogs War Dad on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs War Dad on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: ROAR
item.description: tonight I am going to see cursive. it should be fun. I really like that band. but what I like more is this. It is very funny. ;) ;)So we are at war. but at what cost? I imagine it will cost a lot of people their lives. Check out this blog from baghdad. i just don’t have much to say at this point. I need to do work. I need to not worry.
